name: Square Root Sword v1.1
description:
Defeat enemies with the holy Square Root Sword!

Drag the cards you draw each turn to the hero's sprite, then drag from the hero's sprite to any number on screen!

You are able to modify each one of them with your operator currently above your hero. Obtain temporary upgrades from defeating foes at each level and defeat the boss!

*This is an update to the game on itch with the same name which is made for a game jam. 

Credits:
